data.title: Public Interest Registry on LinkedIn: You're invited to "First
data.meta_description: We are thrilled to be hosting the first DC Nonprofit Club with Community Boost and Social Currant! Join us on 2/13 @ 5:30-8:00pm for an evening of networking…
data.text:
Hear from Lerii F. Smith, CFRE in our latest Good Advice blog post: Develop Your Precious Volunteer Resources. Lerii shares, "It is ‘high season’ for our community’s nonprofit events, campaigns, and board meetings, which inspired me to pull this ‘Key Points Summary’ regarding developing volunteer resources from a presentation I made a few years ago to our AFP Chapter.” Click here to read the principles Lerii says stand the test of time: https://lnkd.in/gqiV6dFt #goodadvice #volunteerengagement

Excited to be with these good friends and great tech founders in a few minutes - 1PM EST today! 🎉 If you could use some better tech to support your nonprofit, join us to learn more in this rapid intro to 8 different nonprofit tech tools that can help you maximize your impact with minimal time. 🌟 #nonprofits #fundraising #givingcircles #techforgood

How Nonprofits Can Increase Education About Their Causes In the world of nonprofits, raising awareness and educating the public about the causes you champion is vital. Effective education not only informs but also inspires action and support. One of the most powerful tools at your disposal is your website. By driving traffic to your website, you can significantly boost your educational outreach. Here, we delve into the top strategies for increasing education about the problems and issues your nonprofit addresses. Learn More: https://lnkd.in/e2vY2khJ

Does your nonprofit's storytelling seem to miss the mark, failing to draw in the support and involvement you're hoping for? Imagine a core message that strengthens your community and boosts generosity. See how a well-crafted story can transform your nonprofit's impact. Dive into our latest blog to discover how. https://lnkd.in/g6qjM-Bb

Ready to explore the essence of Board Summit? Our latest blog reveals all the details – from insightful sessions to networking time for nonprofits and board seekers. Explore how Board Summit fosters lasting connections that matter. Whether you're a nonprofit in search of board members or an individual passionate about supporting a mission, this blog serves as your guide. Read, share, and join us on the journey towards creating boards that genuinely mirror our diverse community.

For the first time ever, Hootsuite has created a version of our annual Social Trends report specifically tailored for nonprofit organizations, in collaboration with GivingTuesday and Pulsar! This year’s trends will help nonprofits focus their precious time and resources to generate even greater impact. Download the report here -> https://ow.ly/xQ5N30szEV9
